questions.question: What is the predominant color of the product container?
What appears to be the material of the product container?
What is the overall shape of the product container?
What type of lid does the product container have?
What color is the cap or lid of the container?
Is there visible text on the container's back label?
What is the apparent texture of the container?
Does the container seem transparent or opaque?
What kind of information is prominently displayed on the back?
What is the overall condition of the container in the image?
Are there any visible markings or designs besides text?
Does the container show signs of damage or wear?
What is the apparent size of the container relative to a human hand?
Is the printing on the label high quality or low quality?
Does the container have any visible seams or joins?
